message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $8000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $12000 to make this work.  This is still a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
